Package com.alyxferrari.jse3d.obj

Class JSE3DSerializer

java.lang.Object
com.alyxferrari.jse3d.obj.JSE3DSerializer
public class JSE3DSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
Saves various jse3d classes to files.
Since:
1.3 beta 2
Author:
Alyx Ferrari

  • Method Details

    • saveObject3D

      public static void saveObject3D​(Object3D object, java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves an Object3D to a file.
      Parameters:
      object - The Object3D to save.
      file - The location at which the Object3D should be saved.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while writing the file.

    • saveObject3D

    • loadObject3D

      public static Object3D loadObject3D​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Loads an Object3D from a file.
      Parameters:
      file - The location from which to load the Object3D.
      Returns:
      The Object3D contained in the file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an error occurred while reading the file.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If com.emeryferrari.jse3d.obj.Object3D cannot be found.

    • loadObject3D
